DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study perform clinical assessment efficacy device DHERMIA® ( Industra Mecânica Fina Ltda ) treatment cellulite body contour
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Efficacy Endermologie Treatment Cellulite Body Contouring
DOC.detailed_description: The present study clinical , opened trial single-center . The patient treat endermologie device . Mechanical massage perform 12 week total 24 treatment session : twice week . A set photograph take visit 1 ( baseline ) , visit 2 , 3 4 standardized position light condition .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Written Informed Consent ; 2 . Subjects agree take part procedure study ( include mechanical massage , photograph ) , fully inform objective nature investigation ; 3 . Female subject 2545 year ; 4 . Subjects present cellulite grade IIII buttock thighs ; 5 . Medical history physical examination , base investigator ’ opinion , prevent patient take part study use device investigation ; 6 . Female subject childbearing age present negative urine pregnancy test use effective contraceptive method ( 3 month enrollement untill end study ) ; 7 . Body Mass Index ( BMI = weight/height2 ) beetwen 20,025,0 25,029,9 ; 8 . Availability subject throughout duration study ( 90 day ) ; 9 . Availability subject maintain stable weight study ( variation le 2 kg ) 10 . Subjects sufficient school awareness enable cooperate degree require protocol . 1 . Pregnant woman woman intend become pregnant study ( next 3 month ) ; 2 . BMI superior 30,0 ; 3 . Subjects diabetes mellitus , cardiac insufficiency , asthma , bronchitis ; 4 . Subjects participate clinical trial ; 5 . Subjects neoplastic disorder , uncontrolled thyroid disorder uncontrolled hypertension ; 6 . Subjects coagulation disorder , use anticoagulant tendency bruise ; 7 . Subjects vascular disorder ( phlebitis varicose vein ) area treat ; 8 . Any prior aesthetic surgery affect area treat ( liposuction , Subcision® ) , 3 month study , may interfere result ; 9 . Any prior anticellulite treatment body measure treatment , 30 day prior study ; 10 . Subjects inflammation active infection area treat . 11 . Subjects history adverse effect , investigator ’ opinion prevent patient participate study ; 12 . Patients cutaneous vascular alteration , difficult visualization documentation cellulite ; 13 . Subjects history medical treatment nonadherence show unwillingness adhere study protocol ; 14 . Subjects come visit ( one miss visit/ month allow ) ; 15 . Subjects intend initiate intensive sport ; 16 . Subjects use analgesic , nonhormonal antiinflammatories , antihistaminics , corticosteroid , diuretic ; 17 . Subjects tan , intend expose area study sun , artificial UV , selftanning study ; 18 . Any condition , opinion investigator , compromise evaluation study .
